column2: BRIEF-StarTek Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.62 May 8 (Reuters) - StarTek Inc: * Q1 REVENUE $69.1 MILLION VERSUS $77.7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
